category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Search_Threshold_Value
preference.preference_description: This Preference contains the threshold value for the total results found for a search, If the total results found is greater than the unsigned integer value in this preference, then we return only Categorization.Category and WorkspaceObject.object_type along with Classification.type and Lbr0LibraryElement.lbr0Ancestors categories in the search response. Default out of the box value for this preference is 0. Setting this value to 0 will disable the preference.
